page.title: 09Elm Tree Farm,Frocester.
page.content: Elm Tree Farm is owned by the Duke of Newcastle.Mr.& Mrs.C.Pain are Tenants, & have two children & a pet dog,Goldie This is a Dairy Farm with 98 Freisian Cows & 100 followers(calves & heifers) A cow has a calf every 11mths.& spends 6 weeks"dry" before calving.The herd is milked at 5am & 4.30pm in a Milking Parlour.Hygiene is important & milk is tested weekly.A cow gives 8 gallons a day,reducing to half a gallon before drying-off.Calves are weaned at 3-4 days.Ear tags show the herd No.G7055. In winter the cows kept in & feed on Silage & Barley Straw.They are given a Computer controlled Concentrate ration The 201 acre farm produces grass for grazing or silage,Stubble Turnips and 80 acres of Winter Wheat & Barley.More Cereals are grown at Berkeley.The Farm is well equipped with machinery,has 1 employee & stock 'sold at Glos.Market.
